page.title: 08 MALVERN PRIORY
page.content: As the church of{St Michael & St {Mary.}The{Priory}serves the parish of Great Malvern which has about{2,000 {people}in a{commercialised area.} The Priory ,in common with normal churches, has worship as its central acitivity. Also there is an Ascension Day service on top of its 124ft. tower and a Sunrise service on the Worcestershire Beacon at Easter. As in the past the{Priory}continues to play an important part in the community. They cater for people on Sunday from 0_18+.A recent calculation showed almost{200}children and teenagers in the Priory family.The {"Outreach"}concern begins within the parish trying to help those in need. The Priory is making links with {Saltley}an inner-city area of Birmingham and with an R.C. church in {Gdansk in Poland.}
